attributes.action: Make BBC 6Music a National Broadcast, and not a digital radio station
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WHY isn't this radio station live? It plays the best music of any radio station, it would be listened to by lots of people of all age groups. Music played includes popular, rock, indie, jazz and punk from all generations.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
